titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, Office of the Secretary, Alsie Falconer, and General Files
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Office of the Secretary, Alsie Falconer, and General Files FA584

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-03-13 15:00:08 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, Office of the Secretary, Alsie Falconer, and General Files

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Level 2 Minimal Processing has been conducted to establish basic intellectual and physical control of the material and assess immediate preservation and conservation needs. Material remains as received, in original folders and storage boxes.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in 3 series by file type.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains correspondence, subject files and grant files.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Ford Foundation has title, copyright and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them.

The Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish material from the collection. Permission to publish extensive excerpts, or material in its entirety, will be referred to the Ford Foundation.
